name: Fas-t-ron
overview: A head to head style Tron style game for 2 players created by Christoph Hirschberg and published in 1988 in 64'er Sonderheft 30. Bold hunt for points Do you know the wild motorcycle hunt from the movie Tron? Two competitors race at breakneck speed through a maze of walls and their own deadly tracers. FAS-T-RON is a great implementation of this idea for your C64.
